file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 31-17-01-04 - MAINTENANCE PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAINTENANCE PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the maintenance panel. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 31-17-01-000-801-A MAINTENANCE PANEL - REMOVAL ALL 31-17-01-400-801-A MAINTENANCE PANEL - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 31-17-01 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 31-17-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MAINTENANCE PANEL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the maintenance panel. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223LZ Cockpit - LH side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE On the left side of the cockpit, behind the 1 Does the task pilot's seat I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is deenergized. (2) Open maintenance panel door 223LZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the four dzus (2). (2) Carefully pull the maintenance panel (3). (3) Disconnect the electrical connectors (1) and (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 31-17-01 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Remove the maintenance panel (3). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 31-17-01 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITHOUT PORTABLE DATA TRANSFER UNIT (PDTU) CONNECTOR Maintenance Panel - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 223 B 224 DET. A 4. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 3. MAINTENANCE DET. B PANEL 2. DZUS (4) 145AMM310071.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 31-17-01 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH PORTABLE DATA TRANSFER UNIT (PDTU) CONNECTOR Maintenance Panel - Removal/Installation Figure 402 A ZONES 223 B 224 DET. A 4. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 3. MAINTENANCE DET. B PANEL 2. DZUS (4) 145AMM310105.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 31-17-01 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 31-17-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. MAINTENANCE PANEL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the maintenance panel. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION PASSENGER-ADDRESS AUDIO VOLUME AND SEN- AMM TASK 23-31-00-820-801-A/500 SITIVITY - ADJUSTMENT AMM TASK 32-50-05-700-801-A/500 LOAD POTENTIOMETER - ADJUSTMENT C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223LZ Cockpit - LH side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE On the left side of the cockpit, behind the 1 Does the task pilot's seat I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the electrical connectors (1) and (4). (2) Install the maintenance panel (3) in its installation position. (3) Attach the four dzus (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 31-17-01 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do the adjustment of the Passenger-Address Audio System (VOL and SENS potentiometers). To do this, refer to AMM TASK 23-31-00-820-801-A/500. (2) Do the adjustment of the Steering System (STEER potentiometer). To do this, refer to AMM TASK 32-50-05-700-801-A/500. (3) Close maintenance panel door 223LZ ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 31-17-01 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
